product_name: mophie Juice Pack Plus Case - iPhone 5
long_description: The Mophie Juice Pack Plus case for iPhone(R) 5 and 5s features a concealed, high-capacity battery, more than doubling the average battery life of your iPhone. Rechargeable battery can be set to Charge or Standby with the flip of a switch; integrated LED status indicator tells you exactly how much juice is left. Included USB cable lets you recharge your battery or sync your iPhone 5/5s to iTunes without removing it from the Mophie Juice Pack Plus case. Thin and light Mophie Juice Pack Plus case offers the full protection of a hard shell.
short_description: The Mophie Juice Pack Plus case for iPhone(R) 5 and 5s features a concealed, high-capacity battery, more than doubling the average battery life of your iPhone.
